Bash(python3 << 'EOF'
import json

# Datei lesen
with open\("/home/marku/.claude/projects/-mnt-c-Users-marku-desktop-ki-kanzlei-lead-dashboard/f8e49eb1-b2af-4aa9-81a9-42124d256883/tool-results/b6e1ec6.txt", 'r'\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)

# JSON parsen
try:
    data = json.loads\(content\)
    # Response extrahieren
    response = data.get\('response', {}\)
    content_blocks = response.get\('content', []\)
    
    for block in content_blocks:
        if block.get\('type'\) == 'text':
            print\(block.get\('text', ''\)\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f"Error: {e}"\)
    print\("Raw content:"\)
    print\(content[:5000]\)
EOF)
